product_name: Madshus Cadenza 100 Touring Cross-Country Skis - Women's
long_description: Step into the light and lively Madshus Cadenza 100 women's skis and enjoy snow-covered hills and crisp, cool air as you cruise along groomed trails. 52mm tips, 48mm waists and 50mm tails offer a stable platform for confident skiing; flex is forgiving to make turning fun and simple. Torsion Cap design features a fiberglass wrap that surrounds the entire air-channel wood core, providing a snappy flex that tapers toward the tip and tail. Air-channeled wood core is light, strong and lively. Multigrip bases feature scales of varying depths in the kick zones to give you good grip without the hassle of waxing. Madshus Cadenza 100 skis are shorter than traditional cross-country skis, making them easier to control and maneuver whether you're on groomed trails or out in your backyard.
short_description: Step into the light and lively Madshus Cadenza 100 women's skis and enjoy snow-covered hills and crisp, cool air as you cruise along groomed trails.
